general.title: General Settings
general.autoSaveSnapshotDesc: Automatically save page snapshots when saving bookmarks
general.shortcutDesc: Customize the shortcut key for saving bookmarks

ai.title: AI Service Configuration
ai.description: Configure AI analysis service to automatically extract bookmark summaries and tags
ai.enableAIDesc: Automatically use AI to generate summaries and tags when saving bookmarks
ai.apiKeyDesc: Your API Key will be securely stored locally and never uploaded to the server
ai.translationDesc: Translate foreign language content to English
ai.presetTagsDesc: Configure preset tags, AI will prioritize matching relevant tags for bookmarks
ai.addTagPlaceholder: Enter tag name, press Enter to add
ai.noTags: No preset tags added yet. After adding preset tags, AI will recommend tags more accurately.

storage.title: Storage Management
storage.description: Manage your bookmark data and snapshots

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Intelligent Bookmark Management Tool
about.intro: HamHome is a powerful browser extension that helps you manage and organize bookmarks, using AI technology to automatically categorize and tag bookmarks.

dialogs.clearWarning: This action will delete all bookmarks, categories, and settings data. This action cannot be undone, please proceed with caution.

messages.temperatureDesc: Control the randomness of generated content (0-2, recommended 0.3)
messages.apiKeySecure: Your API Key will be securely stored locally and never uploaded to the server

importExport.title: Import/Export
importExport.description: Backup or migrate your bookmark data

export.title: Export Bookmarks
export.description: Export your bookmark data as a backup file
export.jsonDesc: Contains all bookmarks and category information, can be used for complete data recovery
export.htmlDesc: Generate a beautiful HTML page that can be viewed directly in the browser

import.title: Import Bookmarks
import.description: Import bookmark data from a file
import.formatHTML: Browser bookmark HTML file (exported from Chrome/Firefox/Edge)

errors.unsupportedFormat: Unsupported file format, please select a JSON or HTML file

privacy.title: Privacy Settings
privacy.description: Manage your data privacy and security settings

dataStorage.title: Data Storage
dataStorage.description: Learn how your data is stored
dataStorage.localStorageDesc: All your bookmark data is stored locally in the browser and never uploaded to any server. Data is securely stored using Chrome Storage API.
dataStorage.apiKeySecurityDesc: Your AI API Key is only stored locally and communicates directly with AI service providers without going through any intermediate servers.

aiPrivacy.title: AI Service Privacy
aiPrivacy.description: Control data sent during AI analysis
aiPrivacy.customDomainsDesc: In addition to system-protected pages, you can add domains that need extra protection
aiPrivacy.dataNoticeDesc: When you use AI analysis features, the following data is sent to AI service providers:

dataItems.title: Page Title
dataItems.content: Page content summary (for generating descriptions and tags)

snapshot.title: Snapshot Settings
snapshot.autoSaveDesc: Automatically save page snapshots when saving bookmarks for offline viewing
snapshot.tipContent: The snapshot feature saves page HTML locally, which may take up significant storage space. You can turn off this feature if you're concerned about storage.

categories.title: Category Management
categories.description: Create and manage your bookmark categories
categories.noCategories: No categories yet, click "New Category" or "Use Preset" to start

dialogs.deleteDescription: After deleting the category "{{name}}", bookmarks in this category will be moved to "Uncategorized". This action cannot be undone.
dialogs.batchDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected categories? Bookmarks in these categories will be moved to "Uncategorized". This action cannot be undone.

preset.title: Select Category Scheme
preset.description: Choose a preset category scheme or use AI to generate personalized categories
preset.generalDesc: Suitable for daily information gathering and work-life balance
preset.professionalDesc: Suitable for developers, designers, content creators and other professionals
preset.aiInputPlaceholder: For example: I'm a frontend developer, I usually bookmark technical docs, design inspiration, learning resources, and also follow tech news and investment content...
